name: MINERA AGUILAR S.A.
description: Silver, Lead, and Zinc mining deposit located in the northwest of Argentina
sampleDescriptions: Securing access to critical minerals, including those in the Investment in Rare Earth and Critical Minerals and Materials (IRA) Act from Argentina for Minera Aguilar.
